name: n8n
description: Free and open fair-code licensed node based Workflow Automation Tool. Easily automate tasks across different services.

N8N_PORT.description: Port on which N8N should listen to. This should be an alias of the platform generated PORT environment variable

N8N_ENCRYPTION_KEY.description: Random encryption key used to encrypt the credentials.

DB_TYPE.description: Type of database to use to store N8N configuration

N8N_BASIC_AUTH_ACTIVE.description: Should basic auth be activated for editor and Rest API access

N8N_BASIC_AUTH_USER.description: The name of the n8n user for basic authentication

N8N_BASIC_AUTH_PASSWORD.description: The password of the n8n user for basic authentication
